name: lpss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c2))

stmt.origin: sstrd(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c2, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2)))
stmt.pretty: sstrd(((limPt ` c0)` c1), c2, ((cls ` c0)` c1), (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
